e my long

mel

I Reademy

deur

Led

Audover. I remember wery

lona lub on Ich 
holly 
on March 9,1908. l I have

seday, 
time is coming a

Ito 
shall like wem Inch 
lake alis Ho Dummer. I

you 
wender

can to me. 
Itowever, a I shall talk in 
over again when I come. I 
shael have a lot to tell

about myself and eta 
lold Andoved boys now 
a China

em

creer

a

Sung
raw: S receberg e my long mel I Reademy deur Led Audover. I remember wery lona lub on Ich holly on March 9,1908. l I have seday, time is coming a Ito shall like wem Inch lake alis Ho Dummer. I you wender can to me. Itowever, a I shall talk in over again when I come. I shael have a lot to tell about myself and eta lold Andoved boys now a China em creer a Sung

metadata.name: Phillips Academy
metadata.abstract: Letter about spending a weekend with Mr. and Mrs. Lynde and mentioning that it was eleven years ago that Kwan met Stearns At Dummer Academy (March 9, 1908), expressing the hope that they would again visit Dummer in a few days.
metadata.note_acquisition: Phillips Academy Archives and Special Collections received the letters and materials of Sung Sing Kwan from Alfred E. Stearns in ____(date)
metadata.note_preferred-citation: From The Trustees of Phillips Academy.
metadata.collection: Head of School (Stearns) correspondence with Chinese alumni
